com.google.common.io

类 CountingOutputStream

  • java.lang.Object

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    Closeable, Flushable, AutoCloseable

    @Beta
 @GwtIncompatible
public final class CountingOutputStream
extends FilterOutputStream
    An OutputStream that counts the number of bytes written.
    从以下版本开始:
    1.0
